nodes.text: Kneebs were small, rodentlike creatures with yellow fur. The Hutts considered them a delicacy and used the cured hides to cover luxury items. They were apparently named for the cries they made.
Transporting crates of kneebs was part of a lucrative shipping business. One thousand kneebs were slaughtered and served at the wedding feast of Gorga Desilijic Aarrpo and Anachro the H'uun.
